official_title: To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into contracts with high-performing public housing agencies to provide for the development of public housing in a manner that eliminates time-consuming interim review procedures otherwise required.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Public Housing Development Reform Amendments - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into contracts with high-performing public housing agencies to eliminate certain housing development interim review procedures.

titles.title: To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into contracts with high-performing public housing agencies to provide for the development of public housing in a manner that eliminates time-consuming interim review procedures otherwise required.
